item.title: Vacant positions (PhD and Postdoc level) in my team at Paris Lodron University Salzburg
item.description:
I am happy to announce that we have several vacant positions (at PhD and Postdoc level) to work with us within the framework of the EXDIGIT Research College at the Paris-Lodron University of Salzburg. EXDIGIT stands for “Excellence in Digital Sciences and Interdisciplinary Technologies”. In this interdisciplinary endeavor, we put a particular emphasis on bridging the existing research areas and represented disciplines at the faculty.

I am particularly seeking for candidates to work with me on topics related to fairness of algorithmic decision-making and adaptation and personalization—specifically in the recommender systems field. Interest in the researching these topics in the music or media sector is a particular asset. I expect the ability and interest to employ both, computational research approaches (e.g., offline evaluation in recommender systems research, data analysis of large data sets) as well experimental (user) studies (e.g., controlled experiments in the lab or in online settings).

The closing date for applications is 31 July 2023.

item.title: Warm welcome at the Paris Lodron University Salzburg
item.description: Today, the Paris Lodron University Salzburg gave me a warm welcome by announcing my start on its website’s news section (in German). Thank you!

item.title: Appointment at the Paris Lodron University Salzburg
item.description: I am very happy to share that I am appointed professor at the Department of Artificial Intelligence and Human Interfaces (AIHI) at the Paris Lodron University Salzburg, Austria, as of today. With this appointment, I will join the project EXDIGIT (Excellence in Digital Sciences and Interdisciplinary Technologies).
